original_text: This very day the noble women of Persia and Media who have heard of the queen's behavior will say the same to all the king's officials, and there will be contempt and wrath in plenty.
korean_text: 오늘이라도 바사와 메대의 귀부인들이 왕후의 행위를 듣고 왕의 모든 지방관들에게 그렇게 말하리니 멸시와 분노가 많이 일어나리이다

sentences.original_text: the noble women of Persia and Media
who have heard of the queen's behavior
will say the same to all the king's officials
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 모든 신하들에게 똑같이 말할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And there will be contempt and wrath in plenty.
